summary: The diff implements both REQ-9 and REQ-10. REQ-9 is addressed by replacing 'सुमिता भोजपुरी न्यूज़' with 'सुमिता भोजपुरी समाचार' in Header.tsx and Footer.tsx, while leaving 'Sumita Bhojpuri News' intact. REQ-10 is addressed via a refactored sticky header in Header.tsx with brand bar, compact search, theme toggle, and category nav. However, there is no evidence that the backend file main.mo was checked or updated, and index.html is not confirmed to have been checked for the Hindi string.

missing_requirements.requirement: Also update the backend sample data in main.mo if that string appears there.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no changes to any backend file (main.mo). There is no evidence that main.mo was inspected or updated to replace the Hindi string.

missing_requirements.requirement: Find every occurrence of 'सुमिता भोजपुरी न्यूज़' in index.html and any other component or page that references this string.
missing_requirements.reason: The file-summaries.txt notes that index.html was modified but its summary does not mention replacing the Hindi string. No confirmation that index.html was checked for this string.
